text: Activating the Tribal Shield ACTIVATING THE TRIBAL SHIELD • The 12-dimensional Tribal Shield is the dormant Species Divine Blueprint within the DNA Template core of the Angelic Human races of the four Evolutionary Rounds. The frequencies of energy and dimensions of con- sciousness of the 1728 simultaneous selves of the Personal Eternal Chris- tos Identity can be activated in one incarnation through sequential activation of the Fire Letter Sequences or “Flame Codes” of the Tribal Shield. • The “Flame Code Fire Letters” within the DNA Template are the DNA Signet Codes that correspond to Earth’s 12 Primary Star Gates and the Planetary Shields through which the planetary body manifests. The Flame Codes serve as the core foundation of the personal 12-Strand DNA Template. • The DNA Template Flame Codes of the Tribal Shield allow for the Primal Life Force Currents of the Density-5 (dimensions 13-14-15) Kee-Ra-ShA Primal Light Fields and the Khundaray Primal Sound Fields from the Energy Matrix, beyond the 15-Dimensional Time Matrix, to embody more fully within the Angelic Human form. • A Fire Letter is a fixed point of consolidated frequency that holds specific frequencies of consciousness into manifest form. The Manifestation Tem- plates or Divine Blueprints of all things manifest are built upon intricate patterns of interwoven Fire Letters called Fire Letter Sequences. The Flame Code
